divs: sighting detailsi was in the garden bringing the washing and looking at the sky when i saw a redobject approach from the west then another object approach from the east- bothred in colour, when they met they stopped adjacent to each other and went fromside to side (rocking back and fore) for about 10 mins then stopped and changedcolour -white- then back to red. they would then either change direction and onego north and one go south or shoot off in original pathways and always return tomeet side by side and repeat sequence and colour change. i realised these couldnot have been anything else other than ufos. they were at high speed, fasterthan i have ever seen. when rocking from side to side they were too close tohave been aircraft with blades or wings. lost sight when ufos shot off inopposite directions to each other. no noise heard. the size from the groundaspirin size\oval.
